title: mystery with 2D int array instance variable

content.description: Consider the following data field and method.
content.question: private int[][] mat; public void mystery () { for (int row = 1; row < mat.length; row++) { for (int col = 0; col < mat[0].length; col++) { if (row != col) mat[row][col] = mat[row - 1][col]; } } } Assume that mat contains the following values. Note that mat[0][4] is 2. 4 1 3 4 2 1 8 7 5 3 7 4 6 9 2 3 8 1 2 4 5 6 7 0 3 What values does mat contain after a call to mystery?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
